description: An application submitted under Section 96a of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a non-material amendment in connection with the planning permission DC/18/105218 for the comprehensive mixed use redevelopment of the Lewisham Gateway Site, SE13 (land between Rennell Street and Lewisham Railway Station) to allow the following amendments:- to amend the Surface Water Source Control Measures approved for Phase 1A of the development (DC/13/83391) (as referred to in Condition 41 of DC/18/105218) along with the consequential amendment to one of the River Alteration Works drawings (as referred to in Condition 4 of DC/18/105218); and - to amend the wording of Condition 57 of DC/18/105218 to amend the trigger for submission of the Air Quality Neutral Assessment.
site_name: LEWISHAM GATEWAY, LEWISHAM HIGH STREET, LONDON, SE13
